mapper.select: SELECT cpname, cpdescription, cpprice, cpcreated, cpvalid, cpstatus, cpno FROM ( SELECT CPNAME as cpname, CPDESCRIPTION as cpdescription, CPPRICE as cpprice, CPCREATED as cpcreated, CPVALID as cpvalid, CPSTATUS as cpstatus, CPNO as cpno, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CPNO DESC) AS row_num FROM M_COUPON ) N WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
